meta.name: English
app.title: oshiTag
copyDialog.hint: iOS may block long-press copy. Tap the button to copy, or manually select and copy.
prompt.groupAdd.title: New group
prompt.idolAdd.title: New idol
prompt.tagAdd.title: New tags
prompt.favAdd.title: New folder
prompt.favTagAdd.title: Add tags to favorites
help.title: Help
help.intro: Tap to copy, double-tap to delete. Import/Export is under ⋯.
help.modeTip: Browse mode hides plus buttons. Tap “＋” to enter edit mode (add/delete/color).
help.groups.longPressCopy: Browse: long-press to copy all tags in this group
help.groups.edit: Edit: copying disabled; long-press to rename; hold ≡ to drag-sort; shows “＋” and enables add/double-tap delete
help.idols.copy: Browse: tap idol name to copy all tags
help.idols.edit: Edit: copying disabled; long-press to rename; hold ≡ to drag-sort; double-tap to delete; tap color dot to change; tap “+” to add tags
help.tags.edit: Edit: copying disabled; long-press to rename; hold ≡ to drag-sort; double-tap tag to delete
help.favorites.copy: Browse: tap blank area to copy all tags; long-press folder name to copy
help.favorites.edit: Edit: copying disabled; long-press folder name to rename; hold ≡ to drag-sort; shows “+” to add; double-tap tag to delete
prompt.groupRename.title: Rename group
prompt.favRename.title: Rename folder
prompt.idolRename.title: Rename idol
prompt.tagRename.title: Rename tag
add.title: Add
color.title: Cheer color: {name}
lang.title: Language
lang.jsonHint: Translation JSON (key: text). Save applies immediately.
lang.addCodePlaceholder: Language code, e.g. en / ja / zh-CN
